name: Daniel Weil
title: Ex-CEO, AXA Partners
quotes: Alex worked for me as an intern at AXA Partners. He was able to take on exacting projects and complete them not only within the prescribed time frame, but to outstanding quality — far beyond what was asked from him.
He also worked well with other employees and team members within AXA Partners.

name: MWO Anselm Chelliah
title: Singapore Armed Forces
quotes: It was a privilege to have known Alex over the past two short years. In that time, he became someone I could talk to about anything under the sun — always open, always real.
His maturity and self-awareness set him apart. He was someone I trusted completely.
